abstract: Taliban fighters overwhelm Afghan forces defending key district in Helmand Province and prepare to seize main government facility.
lead_paragraph: The Sangin district in Helmand Province is close to falling to the Taliban after three days of heavy fighting left more than 60 Afghan troops dead, government officials said.

headline.main: Taliban Close to Taking Over Key Afghan District
headline.print_headline: Asia; Afghanistan: Taliban Close to Seizing Crucial District in Helmand Province

snippet: The Sangin district in Helmand Province is close to falling to the Taliban after three days of heavy fighting left more than 60 Afghan troops dead, government officials said.
